page.title: 16INDUSTRY 1 LANGRISH AREA
page.content: Tooling Products is one of the largest mould manufacturers in Britain. Its raw materials are supplied from the north of England and its product is delivered anywhere by its heavy duty lorries.{The main product is BUMPERS} for the motor industry built to specification. It has its own training scheme of a four year apprenticeship where trainees learn skills on the modern computerized machinery. There are several types of moulding employed at Tooling Products: Injection moulding, Compression moulding and Rim moulding (RIM is ReInforced Moulding). It is quite a successful industry as it employs 150 personel and has a turnover of about Â£4m a year. The plastics which it uses come in bags of plastic pellets which are melted down for easier moulding. It was built during the war.
